verses.roman:
kila-kiñcitādi-bhāvera śuna vivaraṇa
ye bhāva-bhūṣāya rādhā hare kṛṣṇa-mana

synonyms: kila-kiñcita-ādi—beginning with the ecstasy named kila-kiñcita; bhāvera—of ecstasies; śuna—hear; vivaraṇa—the description; ye bhāva-bhūṣāya—with these ecstatic ornaments; rādhā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; hare—enchants; kṛṣṇa-mana—the mind of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "Now hear a description of different ecstasies, beginning with kila-kiñcita. With these ecstatic ornaments, Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī enchants the mind of Kṛṣṇa.
